00150 double MSEFFNet::error(const Array<double> &input, const Array<double> &target) {
00151   double se = 0;
00152   if(input.ndim() == 1) {
00153     Array<double> output(target.dim(0));
00154     model(input, output);
00155     for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(0); c++) {
00156       se += (target(c) - output(c)) * (target(c) - output(c));
00157     }
00158   } else {
00159     Array<double> output(target.dim(1));
00160     for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < input.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00161       model(input[pattern], output);
00162       for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(1); c++) {
00163         se += (target(pattern, c) - output(c)) * (target(pattern, c) - output(c));
00164       }
00165     }
00166   }
00167   // normalise
00168   se /= (double) target.nelem();
00169   return se;
00170 }

00172 //===========================================================================
00206 double MSEFFNet::derror(const Array<double> &input, 
00207                          const Array<double> &target,
00208                          bool returnError) {
00209   unsigned i, j;  // denote neurons
00210   unsigned c;     // denotes output
00211   unsigned pos;   // the actual position in the Array dedw
00212   double sum;
00213   double se = 0.;
00214 
00215   dedw  = 0;
00216 
00217   readParameters();
00218 
00219   if(input.ndim() == 1) {
00220     // calculate output
00221     activate(input);
00222     
00223     for(i = firstOutputNeuron, c = 0 ; i < numberOfNeurons; i++, c++) {
00224       d(i) =  2 * (target(c) - z[i]) * dgOutput(z[i]);
00225       if (returnError)
00226         se += (target(c) - z[i]) * (target(c) - z[i]);
00227     }
00228     
00229     // hidden units
00230     for(j = firstOutputNeuron - 1; j >= inputDimension; j--) {
00231       sum = 0;
00232       for(i = j + 1; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00233         if(connection(i, j)) sum += weight(i, j) * d(i);
00234       }
00235       d(j) = dg(z[j]) * sum;
00236     }
00237     
00238     // calculate error gradient
00239     pos = 0;
00240     for(i = inputDimension; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00241       for(j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00242         if(connection(i, j)) {
00243           dedw(pos) -= d(i) * z[j];
00244           pos++;
00245         }
00246       }
00247       if(connection(i, bias)) {  // bias
00248         dedw(pos) -= d(i);
00249         pos++;
00250       }
00251     }
00252   } else { // more than one pattern
00253     for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < input.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00254       // calculate output
00255       activate(input[pattern]);
00256       
00257       for(i = firstOutputNeuron, c = 0 ; i < numberOfNeurons; i++, c++) {
00258         d(i) =  2 * (target(pattern, c) - z[i]) * dgOutput(z[i]);
00259         if (returnError)
00260           se += (target(pattern, c) - z[i]) * (target(pattern, c) - z[i]);
00261       }
00262 
00263       // hidden units
00264       for(j = firstOutputNeuron - 1; j >= inputDimension; j--) {
00265         sum = 0;
00266         for(i = j + 1; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00267           if(connection(i, j)) sum += weight(i, j) * d(i);
00268         }
00269         d(j) = dg(z[j]) * sum;
00270       }
00271 
00272       // calculate error gradient
00273       pos = 0;
00274       for(i = inputDimension; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00275         for(j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00276           if(connection(i, j)) {
00277             dedw(pos) -= d(i) * z[j];
00278             pos++;
00279           }
00280         }
00281         if(connection(i, bias)) {  // bias
00282           dedw(pos) -= d(i);
00283           pos++;
00284         }
00285       }
00286     }
00287   }
00288   dedw /= (double) target.nelem(); // mt & igel 20010917
00289   if (returnError)
00290     se /= (double) target.nelem(); // mt & igel 20010917
00291   else
00292     se = -1;
00293   return se;
00294 };
